definition: ceremonial robe/formal attire (dinner suit, evening gown etc)
surname Li/abbr. for 禮記|礼记[Li3 ji4], Classic of Rites

clothes/dress/garment/to serve (in the military, a prison sentence etc)/to obey/to be convinced (by an argument)/to convince/to admire/to acclimatize/to take (medicine)/mourning clothes/to wear mourning clothes

sentences.english: You can tell the very rich by their evening dress.
sentences.chinese: 你可从夜礼服认出那些极有钱的富人。

sentences.english: One friend sewed her wedding dress.
sentences.chinese: 一个朋友给她缝制了结婚礼服。

sentences.english: He made a coat of Ligong Wool, which looked nice.
sentences.chinese: 他做了件礼服呢的大衣，看上去还不错。

sentences.english: Go all out with a lace dress and vampy lipstick for a Saturday night out.
sentences.chinese: 星期六晚上，穿上花边礼服，涂上vampy口红。

sentences.english: Give yourself enough time to select the best wedding dress for your Montpelier wedding.
sentences.chinese: 要让自己有充足的时间去选择最适合自己的结婚礼服。

sentences.english: Some photos were of beauty queens in evening gowns or other high-status clothing.
sentences.chinese: 有些照片是身着晚礼服或者其他显贵衣服的选美皇后。
她穿着一件时髦的礼服。

sentences.english: Her dress had got a fine lace train.
sentences.chinese: 她的礼服上有精美的纱拖裙。

sentences.english: I felt awkward as everyone except me was in evening dress.
sentences.chinese: 我感到很尴尬，因为除了我，谁都是穿上了夜礼服的。

sentences.english: How long does it take to make an evening dress?
If you are looking to save money on the catering than why not host a BBQ on the Evening Dresses.
sentences.chinese: 想在婚礼上省钱，为何不穿晚礼服举办一场BBQ。

sentences.english: Strapless maxi dress converts to maxi skirt.
sentences.chinese: 露肩马克西礼服转换马克西裙子。

sentences.english: The library was full of English newspapers, and the waiters wore tuxedos.
sentences.chinese: 图书馆里有很多英文报纸，侍者穿着晚礼服。

sentences.english: My missing corsage, my dress, the limo and hotel?
sentences.chinese: 我的胸花，礼服，轿车，还有旅馆，都是你吗？

sentences.english: It is illegal for men to be seen publicly in any kind of strapless gown.
sentences.chinese: 男性被公然见到穿著任何无肩带礼服是违法的。

definition: old feminine garment, covering chest and abdomen
woman's suit/dress worn over a petticoat
